name: Chrono Crack (Infinitive Game Studios)
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 47

Jump through time and explore a changing dungeon to break out of the loop.  

Dungeon doors and pillars degrade each time you loop and eventually open up and unlock other parts of the dungeon. In order to jump through time and loop, you must locate and enter a time portal. As you explore, you will need to fight off hordes of zomboogers who inhabit the dungeon. The dungeon has five upgrades for your gun that you can purchase to survive against the growing horde.

Fight a huge zombooger at the end!
